description: Retrieves a list of addresses, per end-user, that are registered as an origin address for withdrawal requests.
Deletes an origin address that is used for withdrawal requests.

pathParameters.name: address_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Retrieves an address that is registered as an origin address for withdrawal requests.

pathParameters.name: address_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Adds an address that can be used as the origin for withdrawal requests made by end-users.

Deletes an address that is registered as an origin address for withdrawal requests. This endpoint removes the specified address from the list of approved origin addresses, preventing it from being used as a source for future withdrawals.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.
